Title: Escape the Dungeon

Platform: HTML

Genre: Text adventure

Rating: E

Game Overview: 
"Escape the Dungeon" is a short, text-based adventure game set in a fictional dungeon.

Instructions:
Simply download the .html file and open with your browser of choice! Or run within this window!
